scripts.testLocal: env ENVIRONMENT=local SLEEP_FACTOR=1 mocha src/start.js --recursive src/test
scripts.testLocalHeadless: env ENVIRONMENT=localHeadless SLEEP_FACTOR=1 mocha src/start.js --recursive src/test
scripts.testBuild: env ENVIRONMENT=build SLEEP_FACTOR=1 mocha src/start.js --recursive src/test
